## TileFactory.create() method

Create an instance of (subclass of) \[\[Tile\]\]. The required parameters are passed as arguments to the constructor of \[\[Tile\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
create(dataSource: DataSource, tileKey: TileKey): TileType;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  dataSource | [DataSource](./harp-mapview.datasource.md) | \[\[Datasource\]\] this class belongs to. |
|  tileKey | [TileKey](./harp-geoutils.tilekey.md) | Quadtree address of the \[\[Tile\]\]. |

<b>Returns:</b>

TileType
